Project Summary

Project Information

Field Value
Name asmsupport
Description This project is will help developer to dynamic create/modify class at runtime simply, and it's base on ASM framework. but it's different to ASM, it's make developer don't care about LocalVariables and Stack status at JVM layer, and also don't care the underlying instructions of JVM.
Homepage https://github.com/wensiqun/asmsupport

Project Organization

This project does not belong to an organization.

Build Information

Field Value
GroupId cn.wensiqun
ArtifactId asmsupport
Version 0.4
Type jar
Java Version 1.6
